title: The.Last.House.On.The.Left.R5.XviD-DEViSE NoRAR

tt0844708

I watched the (VHS) screener which was of quite bad quality before. Nevertheless it's a really enjoyable and tense movie and this R5 release should bring the good image it lacked before. :)
(The screener had the release name The.Last.House.On.The.Left.SCREENER.XviD-NEPTUNE.)
Thanks, DEViSE!

@johnconnor2070
This release, most definitely just like the five (so far) other torrents posted afterwards, has a length of 105:45min at 25fps.
25/23.976 * 105:45 would be 109:45min. Maybe that was the framerate of the source. <a href="
http://bayimg.com/JABekaACe" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
